numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The title is: Boomers are a Downer!.
2. This graph shows a global comparison.
3. Young people are more optimistic about the world than older people.
4. In a few places, older people are more positive than young people.
5. In these places, the margin is narrow.
6. It is more common that young people are substantially more optimistic than older people.
9. In Japan, the gap between the proportion of young people and the proportion of older people is about 40%.
10. In the US, the gap between the proportion of young people and the proportion of older people is about 40%.
11. These proportions are proportions of people who say that the world is getting better.
12. This graph is an interesting counterpoint to many discourses about generational attitudes.
13. One discourse says that GenZ is more cynical.
15. There is evidence about job security.
16. This evidence says that the younger generation has worse job security than the baby boomers.
17. There is evidence about home ownership prospects.
18. This evidence says that the younger generation has worse home ownership prospects than the baby boomers.
